name: The Most Shit Game Ever
description:
Welcome to the most dumbest and shittiest game ever made from mankind.

You play as white square, the protagonist of the game. Fight against red squares because, FRICK RED BOI'S.

Now for the fun part:

  • Fight red squares!
  • Reach the flags with terrible animations.
  • Get and earn achievements.
  • High octane gameplay
  • Destroy the worst boss in the history of mankind.

Inspired by Dani's games, go check out his channel.

NOTE: THIS GAME CAN BE MODDED DUE TO THE FILE BEING A .ZIP FILE, SO FEEL FREE TO MOD THE GAME, ITS FREE.
